name: PaperKite
description:
At PaperKite, we’re all about better digital experiences.
We’re best known for crafting mobile-centred solutions for today's digital-world consumers.
We love to help brands better connect with their audiences by using Mobile and Digital to solve their customer experience problems.
From user experience design, to building mobile apps, spinning up cloud services and web portals, and integrating conversational platforms like Siri, Alexa and Google Home, our skills and vision help you keep and win more loyal fans.
We’re based in the heart of Wellington, and partner with clients across New Zealand, in Australia, and the US. Get in touch if you’re looking for help with how to do better for your customers using Mobile and Digital.
READ MORE...
